question: Which of the following is/are the main objective of the Jury system of Bengal which was introduced in 1832?
option1: To assist the European judges by respectable Indians
option2: To provide the power of transferring a case to a Panchayat
option3: To appoint Indians to help European judges when necessary
explanation: The Jury system of Bengal was introduced in the year 1832, during the reign of William Bentinck. The objectives of the system were to assist the European judges by respectable Indians, providing the power of transferring a case to a Panchayat and also empowering the Indians to investigate, to appoint Indians to help European judges when necessary.
